name: AudioFader
type: class
memory_category: Internal
summary: |
  Adjusts the volume of audio streams.
description: |
  `Class.AudioFader` adjusts the volume of audio streams. It provides one
  **Input** pin and one **Output** pin which can be connected to/from by
  `Class.Wire|Wires`.
code_samples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags: []

  - name: AudioFader.Bypass
    summary: |
      Whether audio streams are passed-through unaffected by this effect.
    description: |
      If `true`, audio streams are passed-through unaffected by this effect.
    code_samples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''

      write: None

    category: State
    serialization:
      can_load: true
      can_save: true
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioFader.Volume
    summary: |
      Volume level which is multiplied onto the input stream.
    description: |
      Volume level which is multiplied onto the input stream. Ranges from 0
      to 3.
    code_samples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security:

    summary: |
      Returns an array of `Class.Wire|Wires` that are connected to the specified
      pin.
    description: |
      Returns an array of `Class.Wire|Wires` that are connected to the specified
      pin. `Class.AudioFader` has one "Input" pin and one "Output" pin.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          An input or output pin on this instance
    returns:
      - type: Instances
        summary: |
          An array of `Class.Wire|Wires`
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioFader:GetInputPins
    summary: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.TargetName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.TargetInstance` property.
    description: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.TargetName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.TargetInstance` property.

      For `Class.AudioFader`, this is `Input` only.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Array
        summary: |
          An array of strings representing valid pin names.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioFader:GetOutputPins
    summary: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.SourceName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.SourceInstance` property.
    description: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.SourceName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.SourceInstance` property.

      For `Class.AudioFader`, this is `Output` only.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:

        summary: |
          An array of strings representing valid pin names.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:

events:
  - name: AudioFader.WiringChanged
    summary: |
      Fires when another instance is connected to or disconnected from the
      `Class.AudioFader` via a `Class.Wire`.
    description: |
      Event that fires after a `Class.Wire` becomes connected or disconnected,
      and that `Class.Wire` is now or was previously connected to a pin on the
      `Class.AudioFader` and to some other wirable instance.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: connected
        type: boolean
        default:

          Whether the instance got connected or disconnected.
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The pin on the `Class.AudioFader` that the `Class.Wire` targets.
      - name: wire
        type: Wire
        default:
        summary: |
          The `Class.Wire` between the `Class.AudioFader` and the other
          instance.
      - name: instance
        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: |
          The other instance that is or was connected through the `Class.Wire`.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
